allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Rebrand to OPEN SEA TCG

- Update site metadata, nav, and footer with new branding
- Change logo initials from NW to OS
- Update email to contact@openseatcg.com
- Add setup guide and business documentation
- Enhanced landing page with hero, about, products, and contact sections

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove unused Supabase files to fix build

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
